meanings.sent1: The artist used indigo to paint the sky in the picture.
meanings.sent2: She wore a beautiful dress in indigo for the party.
meanings.sent3: The indigo crayon rolled off the table and onto the floor.
meanings.sent4: The indigo of the ocean at sunset was breathtaking.
meanings.sent5: The indigo of the night sky was dotted with stars.

meanings.definition: A tropical plant of the pea family, yielding indigo dye.
meanings.sent1: The farmer harvested indigo from the plant for dyeing clothes.
meanings.sent2: The indigo plant grew well in the warm climate.
meanings.sent3: The indigo plant waved in the breeze, as if saying hello.
meanings.sent4: The indigo plant was a treasure trove of blue dye.
meanings.sent5: The indigo plant's leaves were used to create vibrant colors.

meanings.definition: A blue dye obtained from the indigo plant.
meanings.sent1: She dyed her fabric with indigo to achieve a rich blue color.
meanings.sent2: The indigo dye gave the cloth a beautiful hue.
meanings.sent3: The indigo dye spilled on the table, creating a blue mess.
meanings.sent4: His shirt was a deep blue thanks to the indigo dye.
meanings.sent5: The indigo dye transformed the white fabric into a stunning blue.
